snippet: A court on Monday sentenced 19 former officials to prison for a series of explosions at an ammunition disposal factory that killed 26 people in 2008.
abstract: Albanian court sentences 19 former officials to prison for a series of explosions at an ammunition disposal factory near the capital of Tirana that killed 26 people in 2008.
lead_paragraph: A court on Monday sentenced 19 former officials to prison for a series of explosions at an ammunition disposal factory that killed 26 people in 2008.

headline.main: Albania: Ex-Officials Sentenced for Deadly 2008 Blasts
headline.print_headline: Albania: Ex-Officials Sentenced for Deadly 2008 Blasts
